hackathon-rules:
- Projects must be started and coded at the hackathon
- Team size max of 5 people, minimum of 2
- All Projects must use bcoin, Cosmos SDK or LotionJS

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $15,000 in the Crypto of Your Choice from one of the top 10 Crypto technologies.
$1,500 in Purse Gift cards. Conference Tickets for the whole team to BlockDevCon. Ledger Hardware. One Hour Coaching Session, 2 Year VPN. For 2nd place team using bcoin or lotionJS.
$500 Cash Prize. 2 Years VPN Service.  For 3rd place team using bcoin or lotionJS.
To the best team that chooses to solve one of these:
